mapper.select: SELECT L5.*, FORMAT((IFNULL(L4.MAX_AMT, 0)*0.1),2) AS OVER_DRAFT_AMT FROM(SELECT T1.SYS_UUID,T1.MSG_CFG_ID,T1.USER_TEL,T1.ORG_ID,T2.ORG_NAME, FORMAT(T2.BAL, 2) AS ACC_AMT,T3.CONTENT AS MSG_CONTENT FROM T_BUSI_MSG T1,T_BUSI_ORG T2,T_BUSI_MSG_CFG T3 WHERE T1.BUSI_DATE = #{busiDate} AND T1.ORG_ID = T2.ORG_ID AND T1.MSG_CFG_ID = T3.MSG_CFG_ID AND (T1.STATUS IS NULL OR T1.STATUS = '10019002')) L5 LEFT JOIN ( SELECT L3.ORG_ID,MAX(L3.BILL_AMT) AS MAX_AMT FROM(SELECT L2.ORG_ID,L2.BILL_AMT FROM T_BUSI_BILL_HIS L2,( SELECT L1.ORG_ID,MAX(L1.INSERT_TIME) AS INSERT_TIME FROM T_BUSI_BILL_HIS L1 WHERE L1.BILL_TYPE = '10009001' GROUP BY L1.ORG_ID) L3 WHERE L2.ORG_ID = L3.ORG_ID AND L2.INSERT_TIME = L3.INSERT_TIME ) L3 GROUP BY L3.ORG_ID ) L4 ON L5.ORG_ID = L4.ORG_ID
